name: dev.ucp.shopping.additional_fields
title: Additional Fields Extension
description: Extends Checkout with merchant-defined additional fields mapped to cart, buyer, or fulfillment data via JSONPath.

input_type.description: UI control type for the additional field.

validation_hints.description: Optional validation hints for platforms. Enforcement is communicated via messages.

pattern.description: Regular expression hint for text inputs.

min_date.description: Earliest allowed date for date inputs (RFC 3339 full-date).

max_date.description: Latest allowed date for date inputs (RFC 3339 full-date).

min_date_time.description: Earliest allowed timestamp for date_time inputs (RFC 3339 date-time).

max_date_time.description: Latest allowed timestamp for date_time inputs (RFC 3339 date-time).

key.description: Stable identifier for the field. Used in values object keys and in messages.path (e.g., $.additional_fields.values.po_number).

description.description: Additional context or instructions for the buyer.

required.description: If true, checkout remains incomplete until a value is provided.

default_value.description: Default value used when the platform does not provide buyer input.

path.description: RFC 9535 JSONPath to the target checkout data (e.g., buyer, cart totals, fulfillment option, or specific line items).

values.description: Buyer-provided values keyed by additional field key.

additional_fields.description: Definitions provided by the business and values supplied by the platform.

fields.description: Available fields and how they map into checkout data.

dev.ucp.shopping.checkout.title: Checkout with Additional Fields
dev.ucp.shopping.checkout.description: Checkout extended with merchant-defined additional fields.
